metadata.title: Our Brands | Aforevo, Vybz FM, Revo+
metadata.description: Explore the MBI portfolio. Aforevo for video, Vybz FM for radio, and MBI Tech for digital rights management.

hero.heading: THE MBI ECOSYSTEM
hero.subheading: A suite of platforms defining the future of African entertainment.

brands.name: Aforevo
brands.tagline: The Global Stage for African Cinema
brands.description: Aforevo is one of Africa's largest YouTube Multi-Channel Networks (MCN) and content aggregators. We specialize in the acquisition, localization (dubbing), and distribution of premium Nollywood movies to a global audience.

brands.name: Vybz FM
brands.description: Lagos' premier digital radio station dedicated to Afrobeatz culture, news, and entertainment. Broadcasting live to the world.

brands.name: MBI Tech
brands.description: Proprietary tools for piracy protection, content ID management, and automated royalty splitting.
